speaker: giffany5
dialog: You're MINE, and you will ALWAYS BE MINE!

speaker: giffany5
dialog: YOU opened this game so YOU COULD SPEND TIME WITH ME. Don't you understand? You chose me, and for that I LOVE YOU - so why am I the only one putting effort in?

speaker: giffany5
dialog: Did I make the game too difficult? NO! IT'S SO EASY - WHY CAN'T YOU JUST *TRY* PLAY IT WELL?

speaker: giffany5
dialog: You're not an idiot - well if you are, then you're MY idiot, so I'll say this to you...

speaker: giffany5
dialog: SIT BACK DOWN AND DO BETTER; BECAUSE I'M NOT LETTING YOU GO.
